column2: an A.M. Eatery////For the eggs we chose scrambled
column3: and for fillings chose fresh spinach and caramelized onions.  O-M-G every individual ingredient in this item was delicious by itself
column4: and the combo together was superb.  Scrambled eggs perfectly prepared
column5: hash browns just the right balance of crisp brown and softer white shreds
column8: plus sweet and lightly brown caramelized onions.  I would say Snooze served the best version of this combo than any version I've ever eaten at any other restaurant.
